trans-unit.source: Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Definisce il writer, risorse, ticket di stampa e le impostazioni di relazione di pacchetto che sono associate a un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref> class for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"> </xref> classe per un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and specified interleave order.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy"> </xref> classe con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> e specificato un ordine interleave.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document that the packaging policy applies to.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento in cui è applicato il criterio di creazione del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to interleave document elements.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine in cui eseguire l'interfoliazione elementi del documento.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the color context.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della risorsa del contesto del colore.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa per il che è stato specificato resourceId .

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso di risorsa per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] carattere.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that has the specified resourceId.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa per il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] tipo di carattere che è stato specificato resourceId .

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] image.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore della risorsa del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] immagine.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa per il che è stato specificato resourceId .

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del dizionario risorse.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource stream for the that has the specified resourceId.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] flusso di risorsa per il che è stato specificato resourceId .

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*> for the current page content.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*>per il contenuto della pagina corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*>

trans-unit.source: The list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*> for the current page content.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*>per il contenuto della pagina corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets*>

trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>per la pagina corrente.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del documento predefinito corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del documento predefinito corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina fissa corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina fissa corrente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Stores a specified <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> as part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Archivia un oggetto <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> come parte di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>ed è valido per una stampante specificata.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The print ticket to store as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Il ticket di stampato per archiviare come parte di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
trans-unit.target: Prepara eseguire il commit nell'archivio di output della pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> con un nome specificato che associa la risorsa specificata con la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource to associate with the current page.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa da associare alla pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The identifying name of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> that associates the current page with the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di identificazione di <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> la pagina corrente che associa la risorsa specificata.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> that associates a restricted font with the current document.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> che associa un restricted font con il documento corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the restricted font to associate with the current document.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del tipo di carattere con restrizioni per associare il documento corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that you want to release.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] carattere che si desidera rilasciare.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"> </xref> per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versioni di <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
